name: Hellevator (HellKnights)
description:
You’ve been in Hell longer than you can remember, the constant torment has whittled away what little sanity you had left and you’ve had enough! You’re going to see the Devil and give him a piece of your mind, even if it kills you. You make way towards the only known way to him, through the Hellevator!

David Kimball - Producer, Art, Design
Tamara Sorto - Creative Director, Art
Sarah Case - Lead Programming
Thi Tran - Art, Programming
Kimberly Vo - Programming
